CustomField.description: Sum of all fixed pay amounts paid on a regular and recurring basis (i.e., each pay period). This includes adjusted basic pay and any fixed-amount allowances and differentials that are paid on a regular and recurring basis (e.g., post differentials and cost-of-living allowances).Not limited to retirement-creditable basic pay; https://dw.opm.gov/datastandards/dataStandard/1584?index=T
CustomField.label: Total Salary
